thread.title: Mark Lanegan To Release New Album 'Gargoyle' In April [News]
thread.title_full: Mark Lanegan To Release New Album 'Gargoyle' In April [News]

title: Mark Lanegan To Release New Album 'Gargoyle' In April [News]
text:
Mark Lanegan to Release New Album 'Gargoyle' in April First single "Nocturne" is available for streaming. UG editor. Music lover. Constant searcher of something interesting and unique. Posted 12 hours ago 9 
Mark Lanegan returns this year with a new album, "Gargoyle," which will be released as "Mark Lanegan Band" on April 28th through Heavenly Recordings. 
Tracklisting is as follows: 
09. First Day of Winter 10. Old Swan 
Mark Lanegan's previous album "Phantom Radio" was released back in 2014.You can listen to the album's first single "Nocturne" below (via Stereogum ).
